ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T22:00:01 [Issue ID 4000-113107] urn:comicvine:4000-113107
ComicInfo.Summary: Continuing from the pages of Fathom comes a story of ultimate loss, hidden fury, unresolved grief, and longing revenge, all shrouded behind the uncompromising face of the Blue warrior known only as Kiani. As a previously unseen faction of the Blue make their presence known, Kiani makes a crucial decision relating to the final events of Fathom Volume 2...and embarks upon a quest that will lead her to answers she may not want to know! Written by Vince Hernandez and illustrated by Marcus (Soulfire: Chaos Reign) To, this incredible 12-page zero issue sets the stage for the upcoming Kiani #1. Loaded with tons of extra sketches and concept designs for the series, this is one zero issue you won't want to miss!
ComicInfo.Title: The Fire Within
